scripts.build:android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && node scripts/build-and-share.js
scripts.build:android:release: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap build android --release
scripts.distribute:android: npm run build:android && firebase appdistribution:distribute android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk --app 1:607033226027:android:0090a554ad21bf47370b6e --groups testers --release-notes '새로운 버전 업데이트'
scripts.distribute:android:release: npm run build:android:release && firebase appdistribution:distribute android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk --app 1:607033226027:android:c7b5371f1b2afc4e --groups testers --release-notes '새로운 버전 업데이트'
scripts.deploy:auto: npm run build && npx cap sync android && node scripts/build-and-share.js && firebase appdistribution:distribute android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk --app 1:607033226027:android:0090a554ad21bf47370b6e --groups testers --release-notes '자동 배포 - $(date)'
scripts.deploy:web: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting && node scripts/build-and-share.js && firebase appdistribution:distribute android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk --app 1:607033226027:android:0090a554ad21bf47370b6e --groups testers --release-notes '웹+앱 자동 배포'
